title: Nell and Fred
creator_contributor_role: National Film Board of Canada, production company

description: Penetrating look at an issues that confronts many people when age and infirmity make them vulnerable. Nell and Fred must choose between doing for themselves or moving under the restrictive car of an old folks home. Their decision will arouse sympathy and understanding.
